bibl.title: Holy Bishops in Late Antiquity. The Nature of Christian Leadership in an Age of Transition.
bibl.note: Chapter 4 studies ascetic authority by focusing on two main themes: the importance of the desert, and in particular the Egyptian desert, in the origins of monasticism, and the representation of Moses as the model Christian leader.

series.title: The Transformation of the Classical Heritage.
